about_the_game:
Nurses, Doctors, EMTs and Rescue Workers - a city overrun by the living dead can never have too many and these fearless characters are ready to help clean up Horror City or die trying.

Made for use with the ever growing POP! art style, creator Vexed Enigma has brought to life (and un-death) a host of brand new characters themed around Medical and Rescue services, each with an extra alternative color scheme for convenient variation. Featuring a variety of skin tones and body types, with full facesets, zombie versions and downed/dead poses, this character pack is perfect for spicing up your POP! Horror City creations!



Features:
  • Made for use with POP! Resources and formatted for use in RPG Maker MZ
  • 8 unique Medical & Rescue Characters with matching sprites and facesets, plus a color variant for each
  • 20 faceset sheets featuring full emotion sets for each character plus zombie facesets
  • Zombie and downed/dead versions of each character, with non-gory versions included for the squeamish
  • Brand new POP! sprite and faceset bases included featuring plus size and elderly characters
  • 8 new "Power Up" objects themed around Medical & Rescue services including Blood Packs, Crowbars, Scalpels and more!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - POP! Horror City Character Pack 1" and "RPG Maker MV - POP! Horror City Character Pack 1" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
